content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. I believe the market value for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is around 600 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing other factors that may affect the rental price. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have no idea about the market value of the apartment. I am here to negotiate the rental price.
I am willing to pay 450 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I see. Thank you for your offer, Hassan. While 450 Euros is certainly a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment, I believe that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Given the current market conditions, I am willing to accept 500 Euros per month as the rental price for this apartment. Is this something you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
I am also willing to sign a one-year lease agreement with you.
I am also willing to pay a security deposit of 1000 Euros upfront.
I am also willing to provide you with a copy of my passport and other necessary documents to prove my identity and eligibility to rent the apartment.
I am also willing to sign a rental agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the lease.
Is that all?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your willingness to sign a one-year lease agreement and to provide a security deposit of 1000 Euros upfront. I appreciate your willingness to provide necessary documents and to sign a rental agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the lease.

In that case, I agree to the rental price of 500 Euros per month and I am willing to sign the rental agreement. Please let me know the date and time when we can meet to sign the agreement and to hand over the security deposit. Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
